General.Name: ZhongDe Waste Technology AG
General.Description: ZhongDe Waste Technology AG designs, constructs, operates, and finances power plants in Germany and China. The company operates through three segments: Engineering, Procurement & Construction (EPC) Projects; Built, Operate and Transfer Projects; and Incinerators. It operates energy-from-waste incineration plants that generate electricity from the disposal of solid municipal, medical, and industrial waste. The company also provides EPC contractor services, which include design, procurement, construction, and installation of energy-from-waste and incineration plants, as well as manufactures mass burn units. ZhongDe Waste Technology AG was founded in 1996 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
